summary: Opening with torch-wielding villagers and a wall bleeding oil, this experimental film attaches vivid scenery and strange characters to the wonderful melodic wavelengths of the band Animal Collective, revitalizing the lost form of the "visual album."
cast: Raigan Alex|Panda Bear|Josh Dibb|Kyrian Friedenberg|Geologist|Bill Homan|Rosemary Howard|Alina Jacobs|Kat Stroot|Avey Tare
title: Oddsac
